name: CreateRouteRedirect
description:
Create a new route redirect for a knowledge base.

This tool is used to create a new route redirect within a specified knowledge base. It should be called when you need to add a redirect to manage or alter the routing within a knowledge base.

parameters.name: knowledge_base_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the knowledge base where the route redirect will be added.

value_schema.description: The ID of the knowledge base the route redirect is being added to.

parameters.name: route_redirect_details
parameters.description: JSON object with details for creating the route redirect, including 'from_path', 'language', 'object_id', and 'object_type'.

language.description: Language of the object to redirect to. If not specified, the default language of the knowledge base will be used.

object_id.description: The ID of the object to redirect to.

object_type.description: The type of the object to redirect to. This must be "article".
